ArgonTest.Name: Access internal method in different module
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::* import ::Module2::MyInstance
proc main(): () do MyInstance.my_internal_method() end

module Module2
import Argon.Core::*
public trait MyTrait public proc _.my_internal_method(): () = puts "called my_internal_method" end
public instance MyInstance: MyTrait end
